name: com.openai.unity
description:
A OpenAI package for the Unity Game Engine to use GPT-4, GPT-3.5, GPT-3 and Dall-E though their RESTful API (currently in beta).

Independently developed, this is not an official library and I am not affiliated with OpenAI.

An OpenAI API account is required.

samples.description: Contains sample chat behaviour and scene
